277840.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - The Adventurer's Journey II
277840.description:
Your exciting adventure continues!

The Adventurer's Journey II Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that will surely give your games some new ambiance! Everything from Egypt to Japan and back again!

This pack contains:
  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks
  • Looped OGG Vorbis files for RPG Maker VX/Ace and WAVs for IG Maker
  • The MP3 version of the tracks are also included
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects
277840.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
